game_description: In this wacky VR game, control traffic your way in the face of outrageous events, flagrant road rage and up to 4 non-VR friends in party mode! Starting out on a quiet corner in a small town, job offers start pouring in from around the globe. Guide rude pedestrians, impatient drivers, and the occasional meteorite along before road rage strikes. Sound easy? Think again! This wacky VR game is full of monsters, (un)natural disasters, and something called… ‘cheese bowling’? Made it to the top in career mode? Keep your VR headset cool as up to 4 non-VR friends turn up the heat in (couch) party mode! TIP: Cast your VR screen for the best shared experience! ● Career mode: Control traffic your way - around the globe! ● Easy to pick up, hard to master: Traffic controlling may seem easy; it isn’t! ● Wacky challenges: Each city introduces its own events, ranging from pesky to outrageous ● Party mode: Join up to 4 non-VR friends in party mode!
Languages: English, English (US), Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), Dutch, French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: This game is so fun I love how everyone on devices can vote on what happens in the actual map
review_2: It is well done. Maybe 2 - 3 hours of fun. Simple - Didn't try multiplayer. I have no idee how to do many of the level objective.
review_3: Missing hand tracking mode, this game is perfect for it. Audio 4 Graphics 5 Game play 7 Fun 8 Controls 3 Music 3
review_5: I mean it’s fun…. While it lasts. There are not many different levels and after you beat them it just gets a bit boring. If I were considering purchasing I would just get something else.
